Begin Mini-Page 588612
Membership
Golf & Country Club Membership in Sarasota
Join the Laurel Oak Family
Laurel Oak Country Club is a private, Member-owned country club in Sarasota, Florida offering a variety of attractive Membership programs - and you don't have to be a Resident of Laurel Oak Estates to join. We invite new Members of every age, from around the world to experience Laurel Oak Life. Our goal is to provide a superior recreational and social lifestyle and the highest level of service - a place where new friendships and lasting memories take form; a place where there's always something to play!
Frequently Asked Questions about Membership at Laurel Oak Country Club in Sarasota:
Q. What are the benefits of Laurel Oak member ownership?
A. Member ownership and control assures that the Club is operated in accordance with the wishes of the membership. The Club experience is enhanced by the heightened interest and increased management participation of member-owners.
Q. What types of membership does Laurel Oak offer?
A. There are memberships in quite a few categories: Golf & Tennis, Golf, Tennis, and Social, as well Junior Annual memberships. Executive membership is also available for those under 50 in golf & tennis, golf only and tennis only.
Q. Are there reciprocal membership privileges with other clubs?
A. Yes, in the summer season we typically have reciprocal golf privileges with about 30 private clubs in southwest Florida. We also have year-round reciprocity with Bird Key Yacht Club in Sarasota.
Q. What member facilities are there in the Clubhouse?
A. The Clubhouse includes men’s and women’s locker rooms, the golf shop, a completely renovated members’ lounge, a large dining room, event rooms and outdoor dining.
Q. Can members reserve the Club for private parties or functions?
A. The Club has several rooms available for parties and offers a wide variety of services. The Club hosts many such functions and is available by reservation.
Planning a wedding?
Perhaps you need to organize a business meeting or celebration, cocktail party or private dinner. The Club’s experienced Catering & Events Director is ready to assist you with room arrangements, flowers, menu, etc. You will be proud of
any event you choose to host at Laurel Oak Country Club.
More Membership FAQ's
End Mini-Page 588612
Begin Mini-Page 588670
Membership Types
Golf & Tennis
A full Membership with unlimited use of golf, tennis, pickleball, swimming, social events and Clubhouse privileges.
Golf
A full Membership with unlimited use of golf, pickleball, swimming. social events and Clubhouse privileges.
Tennis
A full Membership with unlimited tennis, pickleball, swimming, social events and Clubhouse privileges.
Social
Full access to the Clubhouse, swimming and social events.

Begin Mini-Page 588624
Catering & Events
“A private paradise tucked away on the outskirts of Sarasota, Laurel Oak Country Club has built itself to be the premiere venue for everything from wedding receptions to corporate meetings to private luncheons. Whether you’re looking to host 30 Guests or 300 Guests, our recently remodeled, contemporary Clubhouse, overlooking our luscious green Golf Course, is home to an array of beautiful indoor and outdoor spaces perfect for your next event. Here at Laurel Oak, our Team is dedicated to providing an elegant and detailed level of event planning and menu design, tailored to accommodate every aspect of your event needs. Learn more about booking an event or start planning your experience today”
Venue Capacities: 30-300
Indoor & Outdoor
Weddings & Receptions
Banquets & Events

Brittney Szelag
Begin Mini-Page 588864
Brittney Szelag
Banquet & Events Director
With a diverse background in the hospitality and events industry, Brittney has held key roles at several prestigious clubs, including Food & Beverage Manager and Event Manager at Peridia Golf and Country Club, as well as Food & Beverage Manager at Bird Key Yacht Club. Brittney’s extensive experience in orchestrating memorable events and her passion for delivering exceptional service make her a fantastic addition to our team. Brittney will elevate our events to new heights and provide our members with unforgettable experiences.
Phone: 941.378.3608, ext. 242
Email:
[email protected]

Driving Directions
From I-75, take exit 207 which is Bee Ridge Rd. Go east approximately 1.75 miles and Laurel Oak will be on your left.
Laurel Oak is nearby to the many stunning south Florida beaches. Our club offers members a peaceful, country-like setting with easy access to vibrant Sarasota.
